org.drip.quant.calculus

Class WengertJacobian

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.quant.calculus.WengertJacobian

  • public class WengertJacobian
extends java.lang.Object
    WengertJacobian contains the Jacobian of the given set of Wengert variables to the set of parameters. It exposes the following functionality: - Set/Retrieve the Wengert variables - Accumulate the Partials - Scale the partial entries - Merge the Jacobian with another - Retrieve the WengertJacobian elements - Display the contents of the WengertJacobian
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
